txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Broken wood spears from the Dourhands found throughout the northern North Downs. Deliver the items to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar.
'Ah yes, I see it now...ten spears completes the task as expected. We are grateful.'
'Dourhands are a blight to dwarves. They tried destroying everything that was built before them, and now we must make amends by driving them off.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Broken Wood Spears
Birgir Listmaker, one of the miners at Othrikar in the northern reaches of the North Downs, awaits the delivery of broken wood spears.
Deliver the broken wood spears to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar
You are on a task to deliver broken wood spears from the Dourhands in the North Downs to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar. Othrikar is north of Esteld√≠n in the North Downs.
Wanted: Broken wood spears from the Dourhands found throughout the northern North Downs.
